Hi

Anyone knows that a mod adds İon cannon from Command And Conquer Tiberium Universe

İts actually Nearly impossible to make in real life

And extremely diffucult to program because load distance is 2.5 KM

Hi, there's currently only 1 weapons plugin for KSP and every other weapon mod uses that code. There are no orbital weapons that I'm aware of , the closest you can get right now is an airborne laser from BDAC, Boomsticks or one of the other mods, with an altered cfg

Anything you've seen elsewhere, on YT for example of lasers destroying planets is pure movie magic and clever editing, and as you are aware there are limits to what can be done.  There's no reason not to try it out with some re cfg'd parts though, some recent testing with BDAc has shown that there's still room for development and innovation of the weapon front, we have yet to make everything that can be made.

So I believe you want to make something shooting from orbit and out of load distance.

The main issue is , you can not physically check if you hit it or not.

The alternative way I make is getting everything around the location you land your shoot and destroy them.

If there is a better solution, please let me know
